_instructions: 4. Upload the output .md files to the claude.ai project for writing conversations
5. The ra_sessions lists come from PROMPT_CHXX.md and RA_THEMATIC_INDEX.md
6. The ra_section_mapping connects sessions to specific sections of the chapter
title: Chapter Title

sections.title: Section Title
sections.angle: What this section argues or explores

writing_split._note: How to divide sections between writing conversations

ra_sessions._note: Session lists from PROMPT_CHXX.md. Expand ranges inline (13.5-13.8 → 13.5, 13.6, 13.7, 13.8) or leave as ranges for the script to expand.

ra_section_mapping._note: Maps sessions to sections. Each section lists its primary and secondary sessions. Sessions can appear in multiple sections.

chX-section-id.notes: Context for the writer about this section's angle

quo_sessions._note: Q'uo extraction config. Use specific multi-word phrases, not generic terms like 'love' or 'Creator'. min_terms=2 requires at least 2 matching terms per session.

differentiation._note: What this chapter must NOT repeat from previous chapters, and what it CAN reference briefly.
